D0.Line: theBigCheese> Hey rookie. I hear its your first time on the job.
theBigCheese> I'll guide you through this one.
theBigCheese> Basically, you're looking for fingerprints.
theBigCheese> Hold on a minute, my secretary is talking to me.
theBigCheese> Nevermind, I gotta go. Ned, help them.
Forensics4Life> Just guess where one of the fingerprints is.
Forensics4Life> If you guess the wrong space, you'll get an arrow pointing towards a fingerprint.
Forensics4Life> If you guess right, the analyzer will mark it '@'.
not_a_secret_agent4242> Don't screw it up, rookie.
Forensics4Life> Oh, and you have limited guesses before the evidence gets messed up so watch that.

D1.Line: not_a_secret_agent4242> This is just some random banter.
